metadata.title: CVE-2020-11736 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
fr-archive-libarchive.c in GNOME file-roller through 3.36.1 allowsDirectory Traversal during extraction because it lacks a check of whether afile's parent is a symlink to a directory outside of the intendedextraction location.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-11736` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

file-roller - 3.16.5-0ubuntu1.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: file-roller package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.16.5-0ubuntu1.4').
